row.entry: number of atm coupling intervals per day
allow same branch casename as reference casename [TRUE,FALSE]
CAM configure options, see CAM configure utility for details
CAM specific namelist settings for -namelist option
Only used for B,E,F,I compsets: if true will pass VOC fields from lnd to atm [TRUE,FALSE]
CICE configure options, see CICE configure utility for details
CICE specific namelist settings for -namelist option
Options to send to CLM build-namelist (see models/lnd/clm/bld/build-namelist -h for list of options)
clm CO2 type, constant means value in CLM namelist, diagnostic or prognostic mean use the value sent from the atmosphere model [constant,diagnostic,prognostic]
Options to send to CLM configure (see models/lnd/clm/bld/configure -h for list of options)
Value of 'on' forces model to spinup from a cold-start (arbitrary initial conditions) [on,off]

Namelist settings to add to the clm_inparm namelist Note, use ' around character values, as XML parser can't handle quotes inside strings. (list of item=value settings, see models/lnd/clm/bld/namelist_files/namelist_definition.xml)
CLM namelist use_case (for a list see models/lnd/clm/bld/build-namelist -use_case list)
Name of single point resolution dataset to be used in I compset only (for a list see models/lnd/clm/bld/build-namelist -res list)
Data identifier name for CLM user-created datasets (see Quickstart.userdatasets)
Only used for C,G compsets: if true, compute albedos to work with daily avg SW down [true,false]
Only used for C,G compsets: if ocn, ocn provides EP balance factor for precip [off,ocn]
year align (simulation year corresponding to starting year) for CLM_QIAN mode
ending year to loop atmosphere forcing data over for CLM_QIAN mode
starting year to loop atmosphere forcing data over for CLM_QIAN mode
the case name to use for cpl history forcing data for CPLHIST3HrWx mode
year align (simulation year corresponding to starting year) for CPLHIST3HrWx mode
ending year to loop data over for CPLHIST3HrWx mode
starting year to loop data over for CPLHIST3HrWx mode
Sets sst/ice_cov filename for amip runs, only used in F compset
Sets year end of sst/ice_cov for amip runs, only used in F compset
Sets year start of sst/ice_cov for amip runs, only used in F compset
flag for automatically prestaging the refcase restart dataset [TRUE,FALSE]
number of glc coupling intervals per day (integer)
number of ice coupling intervals per day (integer)
number of land coupling intervals per day (integer)
atm to land mapping file for fluxes
atm to land mapping file for states
atm to ocn flux mapping file for fluxes (currently first order conservative)
atm to ocn state mapping file for states (currently bilinear)
land to atm mapping file for fluxes
land to atm mapping file for states
ocn to atm mapping file for fluxes (currently first order conservative)
ocn to atm mapping file for states
runoff (.5 degree) to ocn mapping file
runoff (19 basin) to ocn mapping file
runoff (1 degree) to ocn mapping file

TRUE implies this machine supports the use of the mpiserial lib. Not all machines support the use of the mpiserial lib. For those that do NOT you will have to make changes similar to other machines that do support it in order for it to work. NOTE: DO NOT SET THIS TO TRUE WITHOUT MAKING THE REQUIRED CHANGES TO THE Macros AND env_machopts FILES!!! [TRUE,FALSE]
provenance of surface Chl for radiative penetration computations [diagnostic,prognostic]
TRUE implies using fix to pH scale of carbon thermodynamic constants [TRUE,FALSE]
provenance of atmospheric CO2 for gas flux computation [constant,prognostic,diagnostic]
surface heat and freshwater forcing, partial is consistent with coupling to a data atm model [full,partial]
under ice forcing, inactive is consistent with coupling to a data ice model [active,inactive]
number of ocn coupling intervals per day (integer)
Reference case for hybrid or branch runs
Reference date for hybrid or branch runs (yyyy-mm-dd). Used to determine the component dataset that the model starts from. Ignored for startup runs
Run start date (yyyy-mm-dd). Only used for startup or hybrid runs Ignored for branch runs.

TRUE implies code is built using the mpiserial library. If TRUE, the MPISERIAL_SUPPORT must also be TRUE. FALSE (default) implies that code is built with a real MPI library. If a job uses only one MPI task (e.g. single-column CAM and CLM), the mpiserial lib may be an alternative to real mpi lib [TRUE,FALSE]
